An unidentified '''Septon''' is a minor character in "[[Valar Morghulis]]". He is portrayed by [[Terry Byrne]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
The septon carries out the wedding between King [[Robb Stark]] and Lady [[Talisa Maegyr]] during the night.<ref>"[[Valar Morghulis]]"</ref>
